text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: “Mom, how are you doing?”

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
“I'm doing well! There are so many things 
every day, it makes me almost dizzy.”

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
“The other day, there was a Triathlon tournament at the school 
event. Guess what! I played as a player too!”

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
“It was soooo fun!! And most of all, everyone 
who competed was amazing anywayー”

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
ーI got a lot of courage from my seniors. Like my seniors. I want 
to give courage to everyone with my run.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: So, I want to continue to run with everyone!!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
“It is time!! Tracen Academy Team Triathlon 
Tournament” …Triathlon tournament!?

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
We're going to have a Triathlon Tournament at the 
school! It seems to be part of the Anniversary 
event of the sporting goods manufacturer.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
They're recruiting teams! 4 players per team… 
Dia-chan! We can appear together!

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: Ehehe! I was going to say the same thing now!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
The school event I always wanted to experience before…! Moreover, 
the Anniversary is like a festival and looks fun!

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: The blood of Kita-chan, who loves festivals, is making a fuss?

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Basically! However, even though Dia-chan can't get enough of it～!

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: Ehehe, then, let's search after teammates!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Yeah!! Let's talk to our classmates!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
Triathlon includes the 3 events of swimming, cycling, and 
running… There are 2 runs, and it's a relay format with 4 players 
per team. Looks interesting!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright
text_block_list.text:
Ehehe, it's a perfect event for Ryan Onee-sama, who is versatile 
in sports. Are you going to participate～?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Yeah!! My muscles are already tingling with excitement!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright
text_block_list.text:
Oh my～, then you have to meet your muscles expectations～. 
So, may I join Onee-sama's team?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: You will participate with me!? You are welcome!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright
text_block_list.text:
Of course～. I will do my utmost best so that 
this Mejiro Bright can help Onee-sama!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright
text_block_list.text: Let's win for sure, Onee-sama!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
Ahaha! Aren't you more fired up than me? 
Then looking forward to it, Bright!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Triathlon team recruitment requirements… Huh, there's 
a special rule. You can use the surfboard OK, and 
the second section is a run with a mission.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
The contents of the mission will be announced on the day～. It 
looks interesting, let's scout for a bit♪

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
ーPrizes will be presented by the manufacturer to the team with 
the first victory and with a special prize. The prize is… A 
Buffet meal ticket for a luxury hotel restaurant!?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Buffet is… all you can eat!? …Drool.

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
It seems that the Triathlon tournament will 
also be televised! Ayabe-san youー

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: Not interested.

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: An immediate answer… not that I expected otherwise!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
But, it looks interesting to compete with a team! I can run with 
girls with different abilities that you rarely encounter!

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: Is Top Road-san participating?

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
Hmm, I'm interested at most… Oh, I'd like 
to think about it before deciding!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Gorgeous Anniversary Eventー If I don't go on stage, 
I can't keep the face of Tracen Academy!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Also for the purveyors who pay for the things that decorate my 
body every day! The overlord will produce the best opening!!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
Even about the school and the manufacturer… 
Well, as expected of Opera O-san～!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Hahaha! It's a matter of course as the overlord! 
Well, let's make a casting blanc!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Mm-hmm, “I want you to demonstrate the results of your daily 
training and make it a fun and hot event befitting Tracen 
Academy! ーFrom the Director”! It says!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Oh! This is where the class president comes in!! I have to take 
the initiative and make the tournament exciting!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
ーGolshi-chan got the strongest inro, “the director's 
intention!” This is crazy, can't I just replace 
all the bicycles with crayfish!?

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
No, I should just jump into the sea and become a maelstroms! 
Where's the most interesting team～! Show yourself!!
